symbols.name: LineAttrs
symbols.summary: Special attributes of a line.  Received from [method@Gpte.Line.get_attrs].

symbols.name: Locations
symbols.summary: Bitset of [enum@Gpte.LocationType].

symbols.name: Products
symbols.summary: Bitset of [enum@Gpte.ProductCode].

symbols.name: ProviderCapabilities
symbols.summary: Used by [method@Gpte.Provider.has_capabilities] to determine if a provider is capable of of the required capabilities.

symbols.name: QueryDeparturesFlags
symbols.summary: Additional query parameters for [method@Gpte.Provider.query_departures].

symbols.name: TripFlags
symbols.summary: Additional query parameters for a trip request.

symbols.name: Departure
symbols.summary: Represents a singular departure of a line at a specific station.

symbols.name: Fare
symbols.summary: Represents a specific fare possibility.

symbols.name: JavaObject
symbols.summary: Base class for all objects that internally wrap a Java object.

symbols.name: Line
symbols.summary: Models a particular line of a transit network.

symbols.name: List
symbols.summary: Object wrapping [`java.util.List`](https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/18/docs/api/java.base/java/util/List.html) and exposing it as [iface@Gio.ListModel].

symbols.name: Location
symbols.summary: Specifies a well-known location.

symbols.name: Provider
symbols.summary: Object wrapping a de.schildbach.pte.NetworkProvider, which can be used to query data from an abitrary transportation netowork.  To receive ...

symbols.name: StationDepartures
symbols.summary: Container that holds all departures at a particular station.

symbols.name: Stop
symbols.summary: Represents a singular stop of a public trip leg.

symbols.name: Trip
symbols.summary: Represents a unique trip from a departure point to a destination.

symbols.name: TripIndividual
symbols.summary: Represents a [class@Gpte.TripLeg] taken using a form of "individual" transport (this includes walking).  See [enum@Gpte.TripIndividualType] for all possible ...

symbols.name: TripLeg
symbols.summary: Represents a unqiue leg of a Trip.  Should actually either be [class@Gpte.TripIndividual] or [class@Gpte.TripPublic].

symbols.name: TripPublic
symbols.summary: Represents a [class@Gpte.TripLeg] taken using a form of public transport.  See [enum@Gpte.ProductCode] for all possible public transport types.

symbols.name: Trips
symbols.summary: Extendible list model containing trips from a query.

symbols.name: Debugging with GPTE
symbols.summary: Using the `GPTE_DEBUG` environment variable, the behaviour of the JVM can be tweaked. It can contain multiple, comma ...

symbols.name: Multithreading
symbols.summary: By default, you may only call gpte methods on the same thread that called [func@Gpte.Jvm.create]. Instead, its recommended ...

symbols.name: new
symbols.summary: Creates a new #GpteGeoPoint.

symbols.name: JavaError
symbols.summary: Various errors that can occur either during [JNI Invocation](https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/specs/jni/invocation.html) initialization or over the runtime of the JVM.

symbols.name: PteError
symbols.summary: Errors that can be thrown by the [class@Gpte.Provider].`query_` set of methods.

symbols.name: PteTripsError
symbols.summary: Additional errors only thrown by [method@Gpte.Provider.query_trips].

symbols.name: FareType
symbols.summary: The fare type describes what group of people may be allowed to travel using a specific [class@Gpte.Fare].

symbols.name: LocationType
symbols.summary: The specific kind of a location.   See [flags@Gpte.Locations] for the bitset variant.

symbols.name: NegentweeLanguage
symbols.summary: No description available.

symbols.name: ProductCode
symbols.summary: The product code describes the transport class.   See [flags@Gpte.Products] for the bitset version.

symbols.name: StyleShape
symbols.summary: The shape of the line style.

symbols.name: TripAccessibility
symbols.summary: The accessibility requirement of a trip.

symbols.name: TripIndividualType
symbols.summary: The indivual trip type describes the "transportation method" of an individual trip.

symbols.name: TripOptimization
symbols.summary: Optimization target of a trip request.

symbols.name: TripsQueryRequest
symbols.summary: Parameter for [method@Gpte.Provider.query_trips] used for setting the behaviour of the `date` parameter.

symbols.name: TripsQueryTime
symbols.summary: Parameter for [method@Gpte.Trips.query_more] for deciding if it should query more trips before or after the current ones.

symbols.name: TripsResultType
symbols.summary: The resulting type of a [struct@Gpte.TripsResult].

symbols.name: WalkSpeed
symbols.summary: The walk speed needed to calculate duration of individual walking and transfer legs.

symbols.name: from
symbols.summary: Gets the departure locaiton of the trip.

symbols.name: get
symbols.summary: Gets if the result was successful or the failure kind.

symbols.name: get_ambiguous_from

symbols.name: get_ambiguous_via
symbols.summary: Gets the ambiguous via locations.  You may only call this if [method@Gpte.TripsResult.get] returned [enum@Gpte.TripsResultType.AMBIGUOUS].

symbols.summary: Gets the stop where this leg will arrive at.

symbols.name: get_arrival_delay
symbols.summary: Gets the arrival delay (in milliseconds).

symbols.name: get_arrival_position
symbols.summary: Gets the position where this trip leg will arrive at this stop.

symbols.summary: Gets the time at which the trip will arrive at this stop.

symbols.name: get_arrival_time
symbols.summary: Gets the coarse arrival time.

symbols.name: get_departure

symbols.name: get_departure
symbols.summary: Gets the stop where this leg will depart from.

symbols.name: get_departure_delay

symbols.name: get_departure_position
symbols.summary: Gets the position where this trip leg will depart from this stop.

symbols.name: get_departure_time
symbols.summary: Gets the time at which the trip will depart from this stop.

symbols.name: get_departure_time

symbols.name: get_departures

symbols.name: get_destination

symbols.summary: Gets the terminus of [method@Gpte.TripPublic.get_line] from this trip leg.

symbols.name: get_distance
symbols.summary: Gets the distance of this individual trip leg.

symbols.name: get_duration
symbols.summary: Gets the duration of whole trip in milliseconds, including leading and trailing individual legs.

symbols.name: get_fare
symbols.summary: Gets the fare in decimal representation of the currency returned from [method@Gpte.Fare.get_currency].

symbols.name: get_fare_type
symbols.summary: Gets the type of the fare.

symbols.name: get_fares
symbols.summary: Gets the list of [class@Gpte.Fare] for this trip.

symbols.name: get_first_departure_time
symbols.summary: Gets the departure time of the first relevant leg.

symbols.name: get_first_public_leg
symbols.summary: Gets the first public leg of the trip if it exists, %NULL otherwise.

symbols.name: get_from
symbols.summary: Gets the location the trips depart from.

symbols.summary: Gets the identifier of a line.

symbols.summary: Gets a unique identifier for this location.  Note: this identifier is unique per provider. While it might work ...

symbols.name: get_id
symbols.summary: Gets a unique identifier for each transportation network, matching its constructor function.

symbols.name: get_intermediate
symbols.summary: Gets intermediate stops that this leg will stop at.

symbols.summary: Gets the maximum time occurring in this leg.

symbols.summary: Gets the minimum time occurring in this leg.

symbols.name: get_name
symbols.summary: Gets the human readable name for this location.

symbols.summary: Gets departures at a given station, probably live.  Ought to throw exceptions from the [error@Gpte.PteError] or [error@Gpte.JavaError] domain.

symbols.summary: Asynchronously gets departures at a given station  For more details, see gpte_provider_query_departures() which is the synchronous version of ...

symbols.name: query_departures_finish
symbols.summary: Finishes an asynchronous departure query started with gpte_provider_query_departures_async().

symbols.summary: Query additional trips earlier or later and append it to this model.  You should connect to [signal@Gio.ListModel::items-changed] to ...

symbols.summary: Asyncronously query additional trips earlier or later.  For more details, see [method@Gpte.Trips.query_more] which is the synchronous version of ...

symbols.summary: Finishes an asynchronous more trips query started with [method@Gpte.Trips.query_more_async].

symbols.summary: Find locations near to given location.  At least one of lat/lon pair or station id must be present ...

symbols.summary: Finishes an asynchronous nearby locations query started with gpte_provider_query_nearby_async().

symbols.name: query_trips
symbols.summary: Query trips, asking for any ambiguousnesses.  Ought to throw exceptions from the [error@Gpte.PteError], [error@Gpte.PteTripsError] or [error@Gpte.JavaError] domain.

symbols.name: query_trips_async
symbols.summary: Query trips asyncronously.  For more details, see gpte_provider_query_trips() which is the synchronous version of this call.

symbols.name: query_trips_finish
symbols.summary: Finishes an asynchronous trips query started with gpte_provider_query_trips_async().
